TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebOperationContext extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtension`1<class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>
Public Class WebOperationContext Implements IExtension(Of OperationContext)

summary.span: 一个使您可以轻松访问 Web 请求和响应上下文属性的帮助器类。

span.span: A helper class that provides easy access to contextual properties of Web requests and responses.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何检索与当前调用的 Web 操作上下文关联的 实例。The following code shows how to retrieve the instance associated with the Web operation context of the current call. 此代码还演示如何设置传出响应的 HTTP 状态。The code also shows how to set the HTTP status for the outgoing response. [!code-csharp[AdvancedWebProgramming#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[AdvancedWebProgramming#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/vb/service.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IncomingRequest As IncomingWebRequestContext

summary.span: 获取正在接收的请求的 Web 请求上下文。

span.span: Gets the Web request context for the request being received.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问传入 HTTP 请求中的标头。The following code shows how to use the property to access the headers in the incoming HTTP request. [!code-csharp[AdvancedWebProgramming#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/cs/snippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AdvancedWebProgramming#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/advancedwebprogramming/vb/snippets.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取正在接收的响应的 Web 响应上下文。

span.span: Gets the Web response context for the request being received.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何从 获取内容长度、内容类型和状态代码。The following code shows how to get the content length, content type, and status code from the property. summary.span: 获取正在发送的请求的 Web 请求上下文。

span.span: Gets the Web request context for the request being sent.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置方法和内容类型，以及如何向传出请求添加标头。The following code shows how to set the method, content type and add a header to the outgoing request.
